posts.post_title: T214 Victory Tobacco Kelley for trade (Need T206's)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
FOR TRADE:

T214 Victory Tobacco Joe Kelley SGC 10. 1 of only 2 (the other is a PSA 1).  Very, very tough Louisiana issue, and even tougher to land a HOFer.
[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade/1915T214VictoryTobaccoKellyJoe.jpg[/IMG]


WHAT I'M LOOKING FOR MOST:

1) T206 Cy Young (portrait) in SGC 20-40 (or PSA or BVG equivalent).  Would like it in a Piedmont 350 back, or Sweet Caporal 150 Subjects factory 25 (VA). Would also consider EPDG and OLD MILL.

Also looking for HOFers with these backs:

6. Brown Lenox
9. Hindu (Red) - Factory 649 - District 1 - State NY
11. Blank Back (don't need HOFer, just an example)
17. American Beauty - Series 460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC
18. Cycle - Series 460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
21. American Beauty (no Frame) - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
22. American Beauty (with Frame) - Series 350- Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
23. Cycle - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
25. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
33. Sweet Caporal - Series 150 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
37. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY
38. Piedmont - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA 

Additional HOFers on my want list: Lajoie (portrait) and Wheat.


Email me at: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com, with what you have for trade.

Thank you.

posts.post_title: T214 Victory Tobacco Kelley for trade (Need T206's)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
I originally posted that I was looking for a Speaker.  That is off my want list (thanks Matt).  Instead of starting a new thread, I thought it'd be easier to just recycle.





EDITED on 3/26/09 at 16:53:  to add this T206 Demmitt (St. Louis variation) SGC AUT (due to trimming, but still one hell of a nice card)....also available for trade towards a Young (portrait) and any of those backs I need listed above. OR FOR SALE AT MY COST: $1100.

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade/1909-11T206DemmittRayStLouisVariati.jpg[/IMG]
